channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-TECH GREEN SOLUTIONS 2025
channel.desc: Environmental problems have emerged as one of the serious issues facing the 21st century. Due to climate change, air, water, and living environment have been polluted and now is time to make a new leap forward to deal with climate crisis. ?K-Tech Green Solutions? has cooperated with the Korea Environmental Industry and Technology Institute to introduce the domestic environmental businesses that have suggested innovative solutions to tackle different environmental issues. By introducing the newly developed environmental technologies, new inventions, innovative items and creative systems, ?K-Tech Green Solutions? explores the latest trends in the domestic environmental industry. We look into the ongoing efforts of the domestic environmental companies that have developed innovative technologies and ideas. And we aim to promote the domestic environmental businesses as well as strengthen their competitiveness in overseas markets.
